About Me

This is the about page of my blog.

BIO

Hi there! I am Sameer Choubey.
I'm a super-simple guy who wants to do something different. I love technology. For me, technology is life and will always be. I want to help people to ease their life while making money for the same. Sounds good. It does to me.

Zulip Chat

Open Source Developer
November 2018 - Present

I have been contributing to Zulip Chat, one of the largest open-source chat system. · Till now, I’ve worked in the integrations area where I enhanced the Stripe, Taiga and JIRA webhook integration into the Zulip server. I have also worked on the Zulip’s PyPI API Bindings.

Kickoffcoding.com

CEO & Co-founder
October 2017 - January 2019

Started the website to help my classmates with the assignment of CS11101 (Introduction to Computer Science and Programming) and CS13101 (Data Structure and Algorithms).

Web Development Cell, NIT Sikkim

Technical Member
February 2018 - Present

I’m part of the team that looks after the institute’s website. I’ve worked extensively on one of the largest project of WDC that made the institute’s semester registration online
